category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_PV_FILTER_SHOW_SCHEDULES_ON_EMPTY
preference.preference_description: Determines if schedule nodes are displayed when no tasks are returned from a filter-only criteria in the Program View. This preference comes into play when a filter is applied but has no grouping condition. Valid Values: true false
